comment: I loved the voice-controlled assistant and smart plugs. The devices were super easy to set up. Already looking forward to next box!
The gear is definitely worth more than the price I paid. Only reason for 4 stars is I wish there was more RGB stuff in this month’s box. Still amazing overall!
My favorite was the AI translator — it’s already helped me during travel! The box feels curated by people who truly understand what’s cool and functional.
